message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to own something valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I can meet you in the middle of my original price and your offer, so I'm willing to sell it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $99, which is my final offer.
I'm really close to walking away, but I still want to make a deal. I'll meet you at $98, that's the best I can do.
